name: Pongy (archerized)
description:
It's basically Pong. There's not much to say about it. I decided to clone Pong as my first project. I added some of my own assets and some a couple of sound effects. It's very basic but the whole journey was very informational for me.

Paddle-ball collision sound effect provided by Goup_1.

Winning sound effect provided by LittleRobotSoundEffect.
